text:
@DeAnna4Congress Trump drank some water from a glass & he didn't tremor! I'm so impressed w/ that crowd that only filled up 1/3 of the venue. Well now I'm convinced we can cancel the election! #sarcasm

Also: Number of fucks he gives about the 120,000+ people who've died from coronavirus: 0.
